name: Jira Printable Cards
body:
### Getting started:

1. Drag [Print JIRA Cards Bookmarklet](javascript:(function(){%20var%20script%20=%20document.createElement("script");%20script.src%20=%20"https://avoinicu.github.io/jira-printable-cards/bookmarklet.js";%20document.body.appendChild(script);%20document.body.removeChild(script);%20})();) to your bookmarks bar.
2. Go to JIRA
3. Select the cards that you want to print
4. Click on the newly created bookmark
5. Enjoy the awesomeness!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
